Koastal Longboard ✅ Quick Delivery ✅ Service By Humans ✅ Sickest Brands ✅ Excellent Shop

Koastal's mission is simple: make quality skateboards that are as beautiful to look at as they are functional to ride. Our unique boards and trucks help create the feeling of riding a wave. We proudly make our boards in Southern California.

It's a true invitation to cruise ... a pure longboard surf feeling. The deck is made of 8-ply maple. It features a continuous rocker from nose to tail. The Classic 44" is covered with transparent resin grip and equipped with Abec 5 bearings and Cinetic Crop 70mm carving wheels.

Koastal longboards are made by hand in their California-based woodshop. They focus primarily on shaping boards for carving and cruising riding styles. Their boards are made with Aspen, Mahogany and Purple Heart Woods with a 7 or 8 ply maple core. With longer wheel bases, these boards have just enough flex which makes for a comfortably smooth ride. Each deck includes recycled, spray-on grip tape from their in-house brand ...

Koastal Longboards has been using Lucid Grip on all of their boards since their start in 2008. These boards are handcrafted from start to finish right here in California. They are beautiful boards constructed from the finest woods such as Purple Heart, Mahogany, and Maple.
